original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Faculties

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽9.4. Hetuduka, Ācayagāmattikādi🔽Nahetuṁ naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  hetu duke ācaya gāmattika ādi  na hetum na ācaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: The Chapter on the Triad🔽With respect to a non-cause that is not conducive to the increase of the faculties, … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

original: Nahetuṁ naapacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nanevaācayagāmiṁ nāpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetum na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na na iva ācaya gāmim na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi
translated: With respect to a non-cause that is not conducive to the decrease of the faculties, … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)🔽With respect to a non-cause that is neither conducive to the increase of the faculties nor conducive to the decrease of the faculties, … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above. There is no result.)

original: Nahetuṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na sekkham dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na asekkham dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With respect to a non-cause that is not a penetrating , … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)🔽With respect to a non-cause that is not a non-penetrating , … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)🔽With respect to a non-cause that is neither a penetrating nor a non-penetrating , … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

original: Nahetuṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na parittam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With respect to a non-cause that is not a limited , … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)🔽With respect to a non-cause that is not an exalted , … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

original: Nahetuṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With respect to a non-cause that is not a measureless , … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

original: Nahetuṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With no cause that is not a lower object … (everywhere nine) …

original: Nahetuṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With no cause that is not a higher object … (everywhere nine) …🔽With no cause that is not a limitless object … (everywhere nine) …

original: Nahetuṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na hīnam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na majjhimam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With no cause that is not inferior … (everywhere nine) …🔽With no cause that is not middling … (everywhere nine) …

original: Nahetuṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na paṇītam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With no cause that is not superior … (everywhere nine) …🔽With no cause that is not subject to defilement … (everywhere nine) …

original: Nahetuṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetum na sammatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi
translated: With no cause that is not subject to rightness … (everywhere nine) …🔽With no cause that is not subject to change … (everywhere nine. There is none that is result.)

original: Nahetuṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With no cause that is not a path object … (everywhere nine) …

original: Nahetuṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With a non-cause that is not a path-condition … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)

original: Nahetuṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naanuppannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na magga adhipatim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na anuppannam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With a non-cause that is not a path-predominance … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)🔽With a non-cause that is not past … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)

original: Nahetuṁ nauppādiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naatītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naanāgataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na auppādim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na atītam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na anāgatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With a non-cause that is not future … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)🔽With a non-cause that is not present … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)

original: Nahetuṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With a non-cause that is not past-arising … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)🔽With a non-cause that is not future-arising … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)

original: Nahetuṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With a non-cause that is not present-arising … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)🔽With a non-cause that is not internal … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)

original: Nahetuṁ nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With a non-cause that is not external … (all nine chapters are to be elaborated as in the preceding chapter.)

original: Nahetuṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With no condition as its support … (all as above) …

original: Nahetuṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With no condition as its support internally … (all as above) …
